Package controller

Class MinesweeperController

java.lang.Object
controller.MinesweeperController
public class MinesweeperController
extends java.lang.Object
This class defines the Model for the Minesweeper package.
Author:
kylesmith, brendanp, matthewgleason, austinhillis6, cdpeterson

    private java.lang.String[][] cellStates  
    private int[][] mines

    Constructor Description
    MinesweeperController​(MinesweeperModel model)
    Default constructor for MinesweeperModel.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private int checkDiagonals​(int row, int col)
    This private method checks for mines along the diagonal squares adjacent to the provided position.
    private int checkOthog​(int row, int col)
    This private method checks for mines along the orthogonal squares adjacent to the provided position.
    void clicked​(int col, int row, int size)
    This public method uncovers a square and uncovers surrounding empty space if applicable.
    boolean isGameOver()
    This public method checks if the game is over by searching for uncovered mines and returning false if any are found.
    boolean isMine​(int row, int col)
    This public method check whether the provided position is a mine and covered or flagged.
    boolean isWon()
    This public method checks if the game has been won by iterating through all of the game squares and checking if they are uncovered.
    int numMinesAroundCell​(int row, int col)
    This public method checks for adjacent mines to a given position.
    void setBoardSize​(int n, int m)  
    void uncoverAroundZero​(int x, int y, int size)
    This public method recursively uncovers empty positions on the board when an empty square is clicked.
    void updateMineBoard()
    This public method updates the number of adjacent mines at each square that isn't a mine itself.

  • Field Details

    • model

      private MinesweeperModel model

    • mines

      private int[][] mines

    • cellStates

      private java.lang.String[][] cellStates

  • Constructor Details

    • MinesweeperController

      public MinesweeperController​(MinesweeperModel model)
      Default constructor for MinesweeperModel. The constructor stores a reference to the model locally, as well as references to the mine and cell state boards.
      Parameters:
      model - a reference to the model object used by the view

  • Method Details

    • setBoardSize

      public void setBoardSize​(int n, int m)

    • isMine

      public boolean isMine​(int row, int col)
      This public method check whether the provided position is a mine and covered or flagged. This is to prevent uncovered bombs from being unnecessarily uncovered.
      Parameters:
      row - the row on the board
      col - the col on the board
      Returns:
      whether the given position is a mine

    • updateMineBoard

      public void updateMineBoard()
      This public method updates the number of adjacent mines at each square that isn't a mine itself. This uses the model to update the underlying mines board.

    • numMinesAroundCell

      public int numMinesAroundCell​(int row, int col)
      This public method checks for adjacent mines to a given position. It uses both checkOthog() and checkDiagonals() and sums the return values.
      Parameters:
      row - the row on the board
      col - the col on the board
      Returns:
      the number of adjacent mines

    • checkOthog

      private int checkOthog​(int row, int col)
      This private method checks for mines along the orthogonal squares adjacent to the provided position. This method is used in conjunction with checkDiagonals().
      Parameters:
      row - the row on the board
      col - the col on the board
      Returns:
      the number of adjacent mines in the orthogonal adjacent squares

    • checkDiagonals

      private int checkDiagonals​(int row, int col)
      This private method checks for mines along the diagonal squares adjacent to the provided position. This method is used in conjunction with checkOthog().
      Parameters:
      row - the row on the board
      col - the col on the board
      Returns:
      the number of adjacent mines in the diagonally adjacent squares

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      This public method checks if the game is over by searching for uncovered mines and returning false if any are found.
      Returns:
      whether the game is over or not

    • isWon

      public boolean isWon()
      This public method checks if the game has been won by iterating through all of the game squares and checking if they are uncovered. If any are still covered, it returns false.
      Returns:
      whether the game has been won or not

    • clicked

      public void clicked​(int col, int row, int size)
      This public method uncovers a square and uncovers surrounding empty space if applicable.
      Parameters:
      row - the row to recursively uncover
      col - the col to recursively uncover
      size - the size to recursively uncover

    • uncoverAroundZero

      public void uncoverAroundZero​(int x, int y, int size)
      This public method recursively uncovers empty positions on the board when an empty square is clicked.
      Parameters:
      x - the row to recursively uncover
      y - the col to recursively uncover
      size - the size to recursively uncover
